name: 落石
desc: Deals [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>100%</style> of the target's HP to enemies on the boulder's location.

name: 矿车
desc:
[Minecart] periodically runs on the track, dealing [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>100%</style> of HP to all targets along the path. 
The track corresponding to the minecart's route will turn red for <style=red>1</style> turn before it starts.

name: 喷射口
desc: Generates explosive dust within <style=red>2</style> tiles ahead.

name: 弩箭墙-朝南
desc: Deals [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>60%</style> of HP to the first target along the path.

name: 开关（只能触发1次）（0回合冷却）
desc: Triggers certain special devices.

name: 弩箭墙-朝西
desc: Deals [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>60%</style> of HP to the first target along the path.

name: 喷火墙-朝南
desc: [Fire Wall] Deals [<style=C4>Fire</style>] [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>80%</style> of HP to all targets within a <style=red>3×5</style> area ahead, inflicting [<style=C4>Scorch</style>] for <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 喷火墙-朝西
desc: [Fire Wall] Deals [<style=C4>Fire</style>] [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>80%</style> of HP to all targets within a <style=red>3×5</style> area ahead, inflicting [<style=C4>Scorch</style>] for <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 矿车·特殊
desc: Deals [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>70%</style> of HP to all targets along the path.

name: 冲击弩箭墙-朝南（1次）
desc: Deals [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>30%</style> of HP to the first target along the path, knocking the target back by <style=red>2</style> tiles.

name: 冲击弩箭墙-朝西（1次）
desc: Deals [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>30%</style> of HP to the first target along the path, knocking the target back by <style=red>2</style> tiles.

name: 弩箭墙-朝西-活动（大型关卡4用）
desc: Deals DMG equal to <style=red>15%</style> of HP to the first target along the path and reduces their Movement by <style=red>1</style> tile for <style=red>1</style> turn.

name: 矿车-开关触发
desc: Deals [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>100%</style> of HP to all targets along the path.

name: 开关（无限次触发）（1回合冷却）
desc: Triggers certain special devices.

name: 喷火墙-单行-朝南
desc: [Fire Wall] Deals [<style=C4>Magical DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>50%</style> of HP to all targets within a <style=red>1×3</style> area ahead.

name: 风向标-朝东（1格）
desc: [Wind Wane] Blows wind in the direction of the wind wane. At the end of each round, knocks the first target of each column in all areas ahead back by <style=red>1</style> tile.

name: 固定喷火器-南（2次）
desc: [Fire Trap] Deals [<style=C4>Fire</style>] [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>30%</style> of HP plus <style=red>600</style> HP to all targets within a <style=red>3×4</style> area ahead, inflicting [<style=C4>Scorch</style>] for <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 固定喷火器-西（2次）
desc: [Fire Trap] Deals [<style=C4>Fire</style>] [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>30%</style> of HP plus <style=red>600</style> HP to all targets within a <style=red>3×4</style> area ahead, inflicting [<style=C4>Scorch</style>] for <style=red>2</style> turns.

name: 落冰
desc: Every <style=red>3</style> turns, deals <style=red>30%</style> [Piercing DMG] to all enemies within a cross-shaped range of the target location, inflicting <style=red>1</style> stack of [Chill] and making the tiles [Frosty] for <style=red>2</style> turns.

desc: Deals [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>100%</style> of the target's HP to enemies on the boulder's location.

desc: Deals [<style=C4>Piercing DMG</style>] equal to <style=red>100%</style> of HP to the first target along the path.
